name: Chrono Jumper (Anfern)
description:
You play Genesis who woke up and lost his memories.
You have to go through an adventure to repair the roots of time.
You won’t be alone ! You will be helped by yourself coming from the past.
Be careful with your movements because the time is immutable.
You will need to use your past self to achieve your journey.

We implemented the jam theme "An end is a new beginning" through the mechanic of playing with our past self.
The past self represents an end of period of time and current self represents the beginning.
The story is also driven around the theme, finish the game you will understand by yourself.
